programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages -odac -iadc -d ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o FLpanel.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
; Creates an empty window panel sr = 44100 kr = 441 ksmps = 100 nchnls = 1
; Panel height in pixels ipanelheight = 900 ; Panel width in pixels ipanelwidth = 400 ; Horizontal position of the panel on screen in pixels ix = 50 ; Vertical position of the panel on screen in pixels iy = 50
FLpanel "A Window Panel", ipanelheight, ipanelwidth, ix, iy ; End of panel contents FLpanelEnd
;Run the widget thread! FLrun
instr 1 endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
; 'Dummy' score event of 1 hour. f 0 3600 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
